metadata.title: CVE-2019-13457 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 7.0.x through7.0.8. A customer user can use the search results to disclose informationfrom their "company" tickets (with the same CustomerID), even when theCustomerDisableCompanyTicketAccess setting is turned on.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
